achievement.title: Strike!
achievement.description: Kill 18 Kor'kron Warbringers with a single Iron Star and then defeat Garrosh in Siege of Orgrimmar on Flexible, Normal, or Heroic difficulty.

criteria.description: Kill 18 Kor'kron Warbringers with a single Iron Star.

achievement.title: Proving Yourself: Bronze Tank
achievement.description: Successfully complete the Basic Tank (Bronze) trial at the Proving Grounds.

achievement.title: Drop It Now!
achievement.description: Kill 5 players carrying seaforium in a single battle.

criteria.description: Kill 5 players carrying seaforium in a single battle

achievement.title: Strand of the Ancients Victory
achievement.description: Win Strand of the Ancients.

achievement.title: Terrific Trio
achievement.description: Reach maximum level with three different classes.

achievement.title: Restore Balance
achievement.description: Visit the Shrine of Fellowship in the Jade Forest and follow in the footsteps of Chen Stormstout.

achievement.title: Proving Yourself: Bronze Damage
achievement.description: Successfully complete the Basic Damage (Bronze) trial at the Proving Grounds.

achievement.title: Riches of Pandaria
achievement.description: Find all of the Treasures of Pandaria.

achievement.title: Bounty of Pandaria
achievement.description: Find 10 Treasures of Pandaria.

achievement.title: Could We Find More Like That?
achievement.description: Defeat one of each type of Pandarian champion.

achievement.title: Powerball
achievement.description: Hold an Orb of Power in the center of the Temple of Kotmogu for 90 seconds.

achievement.title: End of the Line
achievement.description: Seize control of a mine cart that is controlled by the opposing team within 20 yards of the depot, and then capture it.

achievement.title: Heroic: Blood in the Snow
achievement.description: Complete the Blood in the Snow scenario on Heroic Difficulty.

achievement.title: Fight Anger with Anger
achievement.description: Defeat the Abomination of Anger in the Crypt of Forgotten Kings scenario with 20 stacks of Uncontrolled Anger.

achievement.title: Warsong Expedience
achievement.description: Win Warsong Gulch in under 7 minutes.

achievement.title: Pay to Slay
achievement.description: Defeat one of the Isle of Thunder summonable bosses listed below.

achievement.title: Death to the Warchief!
achievement.description: Kill Garrosh Hellscream.

achievement.title: For The Alliance!
achievement.description: Slay the leaders of the Horde.

rewardItems.name: Reins of the Black War Bear

achievement.title: Bleeding Bloodhoof
achievement.description: Kill Baine Bloodhoof.

achievement.title: Downing the Dark Lady
achievement.description: Kill Lady Sylvanas Windrunner.

achievement.title: Killed in Quel'Thalas
achievement.description: Kill Lor'themar Theron.

achievement.title: Family Reunion
achievement.description: Capture a battle pet from each family.

achievement.title: Eastern Kingdoms Tamer
achievement.description: Capture a battle pet in each of the Eastern Kingdoms zones listed below.

achievement.title: Onyxia's Lair (25 player)
achievement.description: Defeat Onyxia in 25-player mode.

achievement.title: Emissary of Ordos
achievement.description: Use the Censer of Eternal Agony obtained from Speaker Gulan on the Timeless Isle.

achievement.title: One Steppe Forward, Two Steppes Back
achievement.description: Complete the Townlong Steppes storylines listed below.

achievement.title: The Frostwing Halls (25 player)
achievement.description: Defeat the bosses of The Frostwing Halls in Icecrown Citadel in 25-player mode.

achievement.title: All You Can Eat (25 player)
achievement.description: Defeat Sindragosa in 25-player mode without any member of your raid receiving more than 5 stacks of Mystic Buffet.

achievement.title: Portal Jockey (25 player)
achievement.description: Enter every portal spawned by Valithria Dreamwalker before healing her to full health in 25-player mode.

achievement.title: The Crimson Hall (25 player)
achievement.description: Defeat the bosses of The Crimson Hall in Icecrown Citadel in 25-player mode.

achievement.title: The Orb Whisperer (25 player)
achievement.description: Defeat the Blood Council without anyone in the raid taking more than 25,000 spell damage in a single hit in 25-player mode.

achievement.title: The Plagueworks (25 player)
achievement.description: Defeat the bosses of The Plagueworks in Icecrown Citadel in 25-player mode.

achievement.title: Nausea, Heartburn, Indigestion... (25 player)
achievement.description: Defeat Professor Putricide without using Regurgitated Ooze on the Abomination in 25-player mode.

achievement.title: Dances with Oozes (25 player)
achievement.description: Defeat Rotface without a Big Ooze casting Unstable Ooze Explosion in 25-player mode.

achievement.title: Flu Shot Shortage (25 player)
achievement.description: Defeat Festergut while none of the players in your raid group ever had 3 stacks of Inoculated in 25-player mode.

achievement.title: Storming the Citadel (25 player)
achievement.description: Defeat the first four bosses in Icecrown Citadel in 25-player mode.

criteria.description: Claim victory in the Gunship Battle

achievement.title: I've Gone and Made a Mess (25 player)
achievement.description: Defeat the Deathbringer before Mark of the Fallen Champion is cast five times in 25-player mode.

achievement.title: I'm on a Boat (25 player)
achievement.description: Claim victory in the Gunship Battle without any raid member visiting the enemy gunship more than once in 25-player mode.

achievement.title: Boned (25 player)
achievement.description: Defeat Lord Marrowgar without any raid member remaining impaled for more than 8 seconds in 25-player mode.

achievement.title: Heroic: The Pit of Saron
achievement.description: Defeat the bosses in The Pit of Saron on Heroic Difficulty.

achievement.title: Three Faced
achievement.description: Defeat the Devourer of Souls in The Forge of Souls on Heroic Difficulty without him successfully casting Phantom Blast.

achievement.title: World Wide Winner
achievement.description: Win a ranked arena match in Blade's Edge, Nagrand, Dalaran Sewers, the Ruins of Lordaeron, Tol'Viron Arena and the Tiger's Peak.

achievement.title: Fancy Footwork
achievement.description: Defeat the Abomination of Anger in the Crypt of Forgotten Kings scenario without anyone taking damage from the red clouds.

achievement.title: Heroic: Crypt of Forgotten Kings
achievement.description: Complete the Crypt of Forgotten Kings scenario on Heroic Difficulty.

achievement.title: Heroic: Dark Heart of Pandaria
achievement.description: Complete the Dark Heart of Pandaria scenario on Heroic Difficulty.

achievement.title: Heroic: Battle on the High Seas
achievement.description: Defeat Admiral Hagman in the Battle on the High Seas on Heroic Difficulty.

achievement.title: Fire in the Yaung-hole!
achievement.description: Kill 15 or more Gai-Cho combatants with a single Highly Explosive Oil Barrel.

neck.name: Lost Necklace of the Mogu Empress

trinket1.name: Volatile Talisman of the Shado-Pan Assault

mainHand.name: Horned Mace of the Old Ones

spell.name: Void Tendrils
spell.description: Summons Shadowy tendrils out of the ground, rooting up to 5 enemy targets within 8 yards of the caster for 20 sec. Killing the tendril will cancel the effect.

spell.name: Body and Soul
spell.description: When you cast Power Word: Shield or Leap of Faith, you increase the target's movement speed by 60% for 4 sec.

spell.name: Solace and Insanity
spell.description:
Discipline, Holy:

You gain the Power Word: Solace ability.



Shadow:

Casting Mind Flay while your target is affected by your Devouring Plague causes your Mind Flay to deal 33% additional damage per orb consumed by Devouring Plague.

spell.name: Angelic Bulwark
spell.description:
Anytime a damaging attack brings you below 30% health, you gain an absorption shield equal to 20% of your total health lasting for 20 sec.



This effect cannot occur more than once every 90 sec.

spell.name: Halo
spell.description: Creates a ring of Holy energy around you that quickly expands and grows in power, up to 30 yds away. Deals up to 20,586 Holy damage to enemies, and up to 34,311 healing to allies, with the greatest effect at 25 yds.

spell.name: Divine Insight
spell.description:
Discipline:

When you cast Penance, there is a 40% chance your next Power Word: Shield will both ignore and not cause the Weakened Soul effect.



Holy:

When you cast Greater Heal or Prayer of Healing, there is a 40% chance your next Prayer of Mending will not trigger its cooldown, and will jump to each target instantly.



Shadow:

Periodic damage from your Shadow Word: Pain has a 5% chance to reset the cooldown on Mind Blast and cause your next Mind Blast within 12 sec to be instant cast and cost no mana.

spec.name: Shadow
spec.description: Uses sinister Shadow magic, especially damage-over-time spells, to eradicate enemies.

spell.name: Psyfiend
spell.description:
Summons a Psyfiend that stands in place for 10 sec. The Psyfiend casts a Psychic Terror on a nearby enemy within 20 yards every 2 sec, preferring anything attacking the Priest.



Psychic Terror causes enemies to flee for 30 sec. Damage caused may interrupt the effect.

spell.name: Phantasm
spell.description: When you Fade, you remove all movement impairing effects from yourself, and your movement speed is unhindered for 5 sec.

spell.name: Solace and Insanity
spell.description:
Discipline, Holy:

You gain the Power Word: Solace ability.



Shadow:

Casting Mind Flay while your target is affected by your Devouring Plague causes your Mind Flay to deal 33% additional damage per orb consumed by Devouring Plague.

spell.name: Spectral Guise
spell.description: Your shadow blurs into the darkness, leaving your true form behind. As a shadow you are stealthed, but remain in combat. Lasts 6 sec or until your true form is hit by 3 direct attacks.

spell.name: Divine Insight
spell.description:
Discipline:

When you cast Penance, there is a 40% chance your next Power Word: Shield will both ignore and not cause the Weakened Soul effect.



Holy:

When you cast Greater Heal or Prayer of Healing, there is a 40% chance your next Prayer of Mending will not trigger its cooldown, and will jump to each target instantly.



Shadow:

Periodic damage from your Shadow Word: Pain has a 5% chance to reset the cooldown on Mind Blast and cause your next Mind Blast within 12 sec to be instant cast and cost no mana.

spell.name: Divine Star
spell.description:
Fires a Divine Star in front of you, traveling 24 yds, causing 4,802 Divine damage to all enemies and 8,003 healing to all allies within 4 yds of its path.



After reaching its destination it will return to you, also dealing damage and healing to all targets in its path.

spec.name: Shadow
spec.description: Uses sinister Shadow magic, especially damage-over-time spells, to eradicate enemies.
